Source.Name: xcur2png
Source.Summary: Converter from X cursor to PNG image.
Source.Description: xcur2png is a program which let you take PNG image from X cursor, and generate config-file which is reusable by xcursorgen.

Package.Name: xcur2png
Package.Summary: Converter from X cursor to PNG image.
Package.Description: xcur2png is a program which let you take PNG image from X cursor, and generate config-file which is reusable by xcursorgen.
